channel.title: Highscores Error

item.title: Highscores Error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Notice that a large portion of your methods have been commented out. Try replacing your snippet with this one (The only thing I did was uncomment the code, I haven’t added or removed anything):

[code=Java] public void highscores() {
getPA().sendFrame126("***** SERVER", 8144); // Title
getPA().sendFrame126(“Top 10 PKERS”, 8145);
getPA().sendFrame126(" UGScape Top Skillers Rich noobs", 6399);
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
if (ranks[i] > 0) {
getPA().sendFrame126(
"Rank " + (i + 1) + ": " + rankPpl[i]
+ "- Total Level: " + ranks[i], 6402 + i);
}
}
getPA().showInterface(6308);
flushOutStream();
resetRanks();

}

// end highscores
public int playerRank = 0;
public static int[] ranks = new int[11];
public static String[] rankPpl = new String[11];

// begin pkscores
public void resetRanks2() {
	for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
		ranks2[i] = 0;
		rankPpl2[i] = "";
	}
}

public void highscores2() {
	getPA().sendFrame126("***** SERVER", 8144); // Title
	getPA().sendFrame126("Top 10 PKERS", 8145);
	getPA().sendFrame126("     UGScape Top Pkers", 6399);

	for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
		if (ranks2[i] > 0) {
			getPA().sendFrame126(
					"Rank " + (i + 1) + ": " + rankPpl2[i] + "- Kills: "
							+ ranks2[i], 6402 + i);
		}
	}
	getPA().showInterface(6308);
	flushOutStream();
	resetRanks2();
}

public int playerRank2 = 0;
public static int[] ranks2 = new int[11];
public static String[] rankPpl2 = new String[11];

// end highscores
public void endTutorial() {
	finishedTutorial = false;
	getPA().showInterface(3559);
	canChangeAppearance = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

this is the code,

[code] public void highscores() {
sendMessage(“Sorry, this has been temporarily disabled”);
return;
/* getPA().sendFrame126("***** SERVER", 8144); //Title
getPA().sendFrame126(“Top 10 PKERS”, 8145);

	for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {

			getPA().sendFrame126("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i);
		}
	}
	getPA().showInterface(6308);
	flushOutStream();
	resetRanks();*/
}

//end highscores
public int playerRank = 0;
public static int[] ranks = new int[11];
public static String[] rankPpl = new String[11];
//begin pkscores
public void resetRanks2() {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
ranks2[i] = 0;
rankPpl2[i] = “”;
}
}
public void highscores2() {
sendMessage(“Sorry, this has been temporarily disabled”);
return;
/* getPA().sendFrame126("***** SERVER", 8144); //Title
getPA().sendFrame126(“Top 10 PKERS”, 8145);
getPA().sendFrame126(" UGScape Top Pkers", 6399);

	for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
		if(ranks2[i] > 0) {

		}
	}
	getPA().showInterface(6308);
	flushOutStream();
	resetRanks2();*/
}
public int playerRank2 = 0;
public static int[] ranks2 = new int[11];
public static String[] rankPpl2 = new String[11];
//end highscores
public void endTutorial() {
finishedTutorial = false;
getPA().showInterface(3559);
			canChangeAppearance = true;
}[/code]

I removed //title from both and the sendmessage and compiled and ran but this time the message didnt show up which was a good thing but nothing popped out??
please help asap you can contact me at saiad6@hotmail.com or just message here
